DOC.brief_summary: The Epiphrenic III Pilot Trial investigates whether a diaphragmatic stimulation by interventionally placed electrodes may improve heart function, symptoms and functional capacity in patients with severe heart failure.
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic heart failure (NYHA functional classes II, III or IV) Reduced left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) <35% Guidelinerecommended drug therapy Patient refuses study participation Life expectancy presumably <1 year Pregnancy
